bookTitle: An Inconvenient Book: Real Solutions to the World's Biggest Problems
bookAuthors: Glenn Beck, Kevin Balfe, Steve Burguiere, Dan Andros, Paul Starke, Virginia Leahy, Evan Cutler, Patricia Balfe, Carol  Lynne
Plot: The world is a mess - Iran is developing nuclear capabilities, obesity is reaching epidemic proortions, the divorce rate is rising faster than petrol prices. The solutions to these problems aren't convenient, but radio and TV host Glenn Beck doesn't care about being convenient.
